title: Máximo anotador de carreras y portador de terrenos en Major League Cricket 2024
body:

Deportes

Máximo anotador de carreras y portador de terrenos en Major League Cricket 2024

24

Conozca a los máximos anotadores de carreras y tomadores de terrenos en Major League Cricket 2024

BCL 2024: The Big Cricket League (BCL) 2024 came to an end as Mumbai Marines led by Irfan Pathan successfully chased down a target of 211 set by Suresh Raina’s Southern Spartans at Lalbhai Contractor Stadium in Surat, Gujarat to lift the trophy. The man of the final was Manan Sharma, who scored an explosive 82* off 40 balls, featuring seven fours and five sixes. His performance turned the tide decisively towards the Marines. Jesal Karia also played an important role, contributing a rapid 75 off 39 balls, laying the foundation for the chase. Irfan Pathan remained unbeaten on 18, guiding his team to the finish line with composure alongside Manan’s fireworks.

summary:
**Tournament Name:** Big Cricket League (BCL) 2024

**Winner:** Mumbai Marines, led by Irfan Pathan

**Final Match:** Mumbai Marines chased down a target of 211 set by Southern Spartans at Lalbhai Contractor Stadium in Surat, Gujarat

**Man of the Final:** Manan Sharma, who scored an explosive 82* off 40 balls, featuring seven fours and five sixes

**Other notable performances:** Jesal Karia contributed a rapid 75 off 39 balls, and Irfan Pathan remained unbeaten on 18, guiding his team to the finish line with composure.
